title: When the Night Comes
text:
When The Night Comes is an album by British producer <a href="Breakage%20%28musician%29">Breakage</a>. The album's main styles are <a href="dubstep">dubstep</a>, <a href="House%20music">house</a>, <a href="downtempo">downtempo</a> and <a href="drum%20%26amp%3B%20bass">drum & bass</a>. It was released on 8 June 2015, on the <a href="Digital%20Soundboy">Digital Soundboy</a> label.
Critical reception.
"<a href="NME">NME</a>" called the album "UK bass music at its best."
